content: Subzone of Kallang Planning Area in Central Region, Singapore **Crawford** ([Chinese](/wiki/Chinese_language): 哥罗福) is a subzone within the planning area of [Kallang](/wiki/Kallang), Singapore, as defined by the [Urban Redevelopment Authority](/wiki/Urban_Redevelopment_Authority) (URA). Its perimeter is made up of [Rochor River](/wiki/Rochor_River) and [Rochor Canal](/wiki/Rochor_Canal) in the north; Crawford Street, [Nicoll Highway](/wiki/Nicoll_Highway), [Kallang Basin](/wiki/Kallang_Basin) and [Marina Channel](/wiki/Marina_Channel) in the east; [East Coast Parkway](/wiki/East_Coast_Parkway) (ECP) in the south; as well as [Ophir Road](/wiki/Ophir_Road), [Beach Road](/wiki/Beach_Road,_Singapore) and Jalan Sultan in the west. As Crawford is located directly adjacent to the [Downtown Core](/wiki/Downtown_Core), many commercial developments have since sprung up in this area. Landmarks include [The Concourse](/wiki/The_Concourse), [The Plaza](/wiki/The_Plaza_(Singapore)), [Golden Mile Complex](/wiki/Golden_Mile_Complex), [St John](/wiki/St_John_Singapore) Headquarters, [Masjid Hajjah Fatimah](/wiki/Masjid_Hajjah_Fatimah), [Kallang Riverside Park](/wiki/Kallang_Riverside_Park) and [Marina Promenade](/wiki/Marina_Promenade,_Singapore). Several blocks of public housing constructed by the [Housing and Development Board](/wiki/Housing_and_Development_Board) (HDB) are found along [North Bridge Road](/wiki/North_Bridge_Road) and Beach Road, where the Kampong Glam Community Club and Kampong Glam Neighbourhood Police Post are situated. [Nicoll Highway MRT station](/wiki/Nicoll_Highway_MRT_station) provides [Mass Rapid Transit](/wiki/Mass_Rapid_Transit_(Singapore)) (MRT) access to this subzone. Media related to Kallang Planning Area at Wikimedia Commons This [Singapore](/wiki/Singapore) location article is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it. - v - t - e
title: Crawford, Singapore
